title: Amount spent on smartphone accessories by U.S. consumers 2010
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Android owners had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for Under $50. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response BlackBerry owners for $200 and up.
In Response iPhone owners, $50 - $100 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Response Android owners out of all 3 Responses.
There is a gap of 14.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for $50 - $100 in Response iPhone owners and Android owners.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 3 different Responses for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up that are presented on the X-axis.
Response Android owners had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for Under $50. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response BlackBerry owners for $200 and up.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Response Android owners had the maximum SOME LABEL among all 4 groups, and it was for Under $50. The minimum SOME LABEL was observed in Response BlackBerry owners for $200 and up.
In Response iPhone owners, $50 - $100 had the maximum SOME LABEL and it saw the lowest in Response Android owners out of all 3 Responses.
There is a gap of 14.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for $50 - $100 in Response iPhone owners and Android owners.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 3 different Responses on X-axis for 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Response Android owners, Under $50 had the highest SOME LABEL 60.0 among the 4 groups and in BlackBerry owners, $200 and up had the lowest SOME LABEL 1.0.
In Response iPhone owners, $50 - $100 had the highest SOME LABEL among all 3 Responses and it has the lowest SOME LABEL in Response Android owners.
Response iPhone owners and Android owners had the biggest gap of 14.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for $50 - $100.
Out of all 4 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL was found in case of Under $50.
Under $50 had the maximum SOME LABEL out of all 4 groups in Response Android owners followed by Under $50 in Android owners, and the minimum SOME LABEL is found for $200 and up in BlackBerry owners.
Averaging all 4 groups Under $50, $50 - $100, $100 - $200, and $200 and up, the Response BlackBerry owners is the maximum SOME LABEL and Android owners is the minimum SOME LABEL.
